id.description: ID of the record you are acting upon.

x-apideck-consumer-id.description: ID of the consumer which you want to get or push data from

x-apideck-app-id.description: The ID of your Unify application

x-apideck-service-id.description: Provide the service id you want to call (e.g., pipedrive). Only needed when a consumer has activated multiple integrations for a Unified API.

raw.description: Include raw response. Mostly used for debugging purposes

active.description: Whether the Note is active or not.

company_id.description: The company that is related to the note.

contact_id.description: The contact that is related to the note.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the note was created

created_by.description: The user that created the note.

id.description: The unique identifier of the note

lead_id.description: The lead that is related to the note.

opportunity_id.description: The opportunity that is related to the note.

owner_id.description: The user that owns the note.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the note was last updated

updated_by.description: The user that last updated the note.

CustomMappings.description: When custom mappings are configured on the resource, the result is included here.
